About.paragraph1: Vietnam Global Brand Summit™ is an annual platform that brings together leading executives, brand managers, industry experts, and influencers to foster creative ideas and advanced solutions to scale up Vietnam brands globally.
About.paragraph2: Vietnam Global Brand Summit™ 2024: Brand-Led Sustainability™ is a destination for connecting with a community of visionary brands committed to sustainability. The summit will explore various aspects and lessons learned from leading sustainable brands globally, regionally, and within Vietnam, along with in-depth research on shifting consumer behaviors toward sustainability.

Services.name: Become one of the top 10% of pioneering brands in the 'Brand-Led Sustainability™' to win market share.
Meet visionary leaders in innovative thinking, sustainability influencers, brand changemakers, practitioners, and policymakers to inspire, share, learn, and connect.
Discuss actionable plans for brands to proactively innovate and drive changes in consumer behavior.

Contact.address: Tầng 9, Tòa nhà Empress Tower, 138-142 Hai Bà Trưng, P.Đa Kao, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Features.title: FORUM
Features.subtitle: Brand-led Sustainability™ Forum
Features.text: Meet, learn and collect valuable and actionable insights from Brand-led Sustainability™ game-changers, industry leaders, and forward-thinking practitioners across various sectors

Features.title: AWARD
Features.subtitle: Kotler Awards
Features.text: Global recognition from legendary marketing mastermind for impactful marketers. This award also serves as a platform to showcase new start-ups and unique innovations which have set new standards for the industry.

Features.title: EXHIBITION
Features.subtitle: Feedback Loops International Art Exhibition
Features.text: The exhibition gathers 40 artists from various countries around the world as well as collectives and brands collaborating to explore different sustainable models, creating a space where art, technology, and society intersect.

Features.title: LEADERSHIP COURSE
Features.subtitle: The Purpose To Impact - Transform Your Impact
Features.text: The Purpose to Impact™ Program is a transformative experience that helps leaders and their teams to uncover the unique gift they bring to the world—their purpose.
